tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE compliance_documents (
  document_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  document_name VARCHAR(255),
  document_type VARCHAR(50),
  compliance_status BOOLEAN,
  last_updated_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE compliance_documents (
    document_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    document_title TEXT NOT NULL,
    document_type TEXT NOT NULL,
    document_content TEXT,
    document_owner TEXT NOT NULL,
    date_created TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE compliance_checks (
    check_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    document_id UUID REFERENCES compliance_documents(document_id),
    check_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    check_result TEXT NOT NULL,
    responsible_person TEXT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE compliance_reports (
    report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    check_id UUID REFERENCES compliance_checks(check_id),
    report_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    report_content TEXT,
    report_owner TEXT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE regulations (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  regulation_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  compliance_status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE documents (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  document_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  document_type VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  document_content TEXT,
  document_owner VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  document_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE audits (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  audit_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  audit_date DATE,
  auditor VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  audit_result TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE violations (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  violation_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  violation_description TEXT,
  violation_date DATE,
  reporter_email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
)
